description: Your tastebuds are in for a treat with this vibrant and creamy blackberry frozen yoghurt. All you need is 3 ingredients to make this eye-catching dessert.
keywords: Frozen yoghurt,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Christmas,Video,Low fat,Summer
name: Easy Blackberry Frozen Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place 500g blackberries, syrup and yoghurt in a food processor and process until smooth. Transfer to a 1L capacity freezer-proof container. Smooth top. Cover and freeze for 4 hours or until firm.

HowToTip.tipText: This recipe is best served soon after it's made. The longer the frozen yoghurt is stored, the icier it becomes.

recipeInstructions.text: Stand frozen yoghurt at room temperature for 10 minutes. Halve remaining blackberries lengthways. Scoop frozen yoghurt into bowls and serve with blackberries (see Tip).
